mapper.select: select count(*) from sys_action inner join sys_permission permission on sys_action.permission_id = permission.id where permission.permission_name = #{name} and sys_action.menu_id = #{menuId}

select sys_action.permission_id id, sys_action.menu_id menuId, sys_action.addition_infomation additionInfomation, sys_action.remark remark, permission.permission_name permissionName, permission.permission_key permissionKey, permission.create_time createTime, permission.update_time updateTime, permission.enabled enabled, permission.type type, permission.sort sort, permission.sys_system_id sysSystemId from sys_action inner join sys_permission permission on sys_action.permission_id = permission.id where sys_action.menu_id = #{menuId}
